Project: Sorex

Documentation:


Project


To view project pages, please use the navigation panel on the left.


Build

Build commands:

npm run dev

Launches the development mode

npm run build

Launches the project build mode into the dist folder

npm run zip

Launches the project build mode into an archive

npm run ftp

Launches the project build mode and sends it to the ftp server

npm run page -- --page=filename --name=page_name

Creates a new page and generates all necessary files for the page to function in the project
